name: IDFA
description: The IDFA extension gives you simple access to the advertising identifiers on Android and iOS.

parameters.name: userTrackingUsageDescription
parameters.defaultValue: Allows us to deliver personalized ads for you.
parameters.description:
Text shown in the advertising identifier authorisation dialog on iOS. 
 See https://docs.airnativeextensions.com/docs/idfa/get-advertising-identifier#authorisation
